name: Organic Grocery Bundle
description: A bundle of fresh organic produce including fruits, vegetables, and herbs sourced directly from local farms.

name: Organic Honey
description: Pure and natural organic honey sourced from sustainable beekeeping practices, perfect for sweetening your dishes.

description: Premium quality organic brown rice, rich in nutrients and fiber, perfect for a healthy diet.

name: Whole Grain Bread
description: Nutritious and delicious whole grain bread, baked fresh daily.
